tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor is very calm,  composed, and hears us before suggesting any treatment. He gives clear directions and explains in detail on the treatment, medicines and how to handle our little ones.

Doctor is really very good, knowledgeable,compassionate and calm. He listens to the issues and explains the root causes very well. The medicines provided are always upto the mark, situation based and depends on the baby previous health backgrounds. Always explains or answers all the questions or concerns in a very much understandable manner to the parents with great patience . We have been visiting Dr. Baliwanth right from the newborn stage of our baby. He was always approachable and responsive for all the urgent queries as well. 
Overall we definitely recommend the doctor for anyone who is looking for a good, trusted paediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Baliwanth Anandakrishnan is highly patient and accommodative in understanding both the parents & children's concern and diagnoses the root cause of the problem.  He gives a holistic approach and guides us for the lifestyle betterment.  Above all he is approachable for any emergency. "Medicines can cure diseases, but only doctors can cure patients.”

Dr. Anandakrishnan- ********* ************* *** patient Doctor. He believes in treating the root cause and not in over medicating. He explained the entire treatment protocol and the reasoning behind it. He took a very balanced approach and didn’t rush through the appointment. Excellent experience. Thank you.

** ** ** * * * * * ******. He asked us to get dengue test & blood culture for by baby **** *** ******** *** *** ** ****** ** **** *** ******* *** ** *** *** ** ***** ** ** *** ** ***** But when I got the reports and took it to him, he didn't even look at those reports. **** ***** *** *** ** **** ** ** **** *** ******* ***** ***** *** ** ******* Besides, he is never on time. I won't recommend him. I tried to complain to him that the pathology staff pricked the syringe into my baby even though that staff was not able to locate the veins. But he was not interested in my complaint.

I won't recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor consultation was good. But the reception and pharmacy was terrible. Went with 2 babies, actual consultation time was at 8 pm, then they called and asked us to reach by 6pm. Then we waited till 7.30. After consulting, went to pharmacy, he was not sure of most of the medicines, he WhatsApp the prescription to some one waited for the reply. So another half an hour only for 3 medicine and payment at reception. I booked through practo, registration fee mentioned was 800, but they charged 900. Only good thing was doctor behaviour and explanation.

Dr. is friendly & calm, speaks specifically to the point. It would be more helpful if Dr. explains more info about root cause & treatment methods263375. I am really frustrated about discharge procedure Dr. had adviced to discharge my kid at 8:45 am & even upon multiple follow-up Duty Doctor Anju didn't start our discharge procedure  until 2:45 pm i.e. 6 hrs wait + another 4-6 hrs wait to get final Authorization. My concern is Y it takes Dr. Anju 6 hr to even start our claim even after so many follow ups
Doctor listen to kids health issues with patience & we didn't need to wait for long time for consultation.
Doctor was extremely patient with my child and explained the cause and the required treatment in detail. Highly recommend!

The clinic is Very hygienic, and staff are extremely friendly . Dr.Baliwanth sir takes his time to give proper explanation for clearer understanding and clears all your doubts very patiently ..The nurses there are very caring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very clam and patient with children. He never gets irritated no matter how many questions we ask. Always answers them with smile. The nursing staff are highly proffesiona and supportive. Especially nurse SANI. Very good. Clinic is very hygienic. First Class.

For many years, my niece has suffered from a variety of allergies, Cough, cold, and nasal difficulties. Skin creams,syrups, and various antibiotics have provided no relief. Finally I consulted Dr At Kasper . The child is now absolutely perfect thanks to dr.baliwanth care* **** ****** ****** ** ************

Dr.Baliwanth is a very competent, patient and kind doctor. He is also very good with new born babies.His insistence to give antibiotics only as a last resort surely speaks of his high quality. We were very lucky that both our children are getting his care while growing up.

We consulted him for lactose intolerance issue, for our 2 months old baby, stomach discomfort and gas as a result of lactose intolerance. We had previously consulted some doctors who had not prescribed any medicine for this. Dr. Baliwanth listened patiently to our questions and performed a thorough examination of our baby. We noticed improvement in just 2 days.

I highly recommend Dr.Baliwanth for children's health issues. His prescribed medicine worked well for my son and the best part is that he explains what medication need to be taken based on the further observation so that parents can have the medicine on hand on urgent basis.. good medication at early stage will definitely lessen the hospital visits and improves the child health..

Good and excellent  with doctor explanation and treatment and friendly doctor and explained about the symptoms well
Doctor was very friendly and helpful. He is patient and answers all the queries. He is very good with kids.

**** ************* ** ***** Always communicates effectively and has lots of patience. Dr Baliwanth genuinely cares about his patients, a very trustworthy doctor. I would recommend him to all parents looking for a good paediatrician.

.

**** ************* ** ********** Always treats children with patience.

**** ****** ** **** **** ****** With the current situation hygiene of the place is very important. The clinic is very well maintained. Very hygienic. Doctor is very calm and professional. Receptionist staff are great.

************ ** ** ********* ************** He is extremely caring, compassionate, and patient with kids. He is my daughter's paediatrician I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for an ideal paediatrician for his/her child.
